import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Sidebar from "./common/Sidebar"; import "./assets/css/landing.css"; import Phone from "./assets/img/hero.png"; import Feature from "./assets/img/features.png"; import Logo from "./assets/img/logo-light.svg"; import Android from "./assets/img/d-app1.svg"; import Apple from "./assets/img/d-app2.svg"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import brochurePDF from "./assets/brochure.pdf"; import "./assets/vendor/icofont/icofont.min.css"; import "./assets/vendor/boxicons/css/boxicons.min.css"; import "./assets/vendor/venobox/venobox.css"; import "./assets/vendor/remixicon/remixicon.css"; import "./assets/vendor/owl.carousel/assets/owl.carousel.min.css"; export default class Home extends Component { render() { return ( {/* ======= Header ======= */}

{/* Uncomment below if you prefer to use an image logo */} {/* */}
  • Register
  • Login
{/* .nav-menu */}
{/* End Header */} {/* ======= Hero Section ======= */}

Enjoy Affordable Homes and Lands with
Super Convenient Payment Plans

{/*

We are team of talanted designers making websites with Bootstrap

*/}



Get Started
{/* End Hero */}
{/* ======= About Section ======= */}

WHO WE ARE

SS Afri Homes and Properties is a Real Estate Firm positioned to be one of Nigeria’s foremost Real Estate Company which is committed to providing superior Real Estate Services.

OUR VISION

- To provide solution to defraud in Real estate industry.

- To provide adequate solution for Housing Deficits in Nigeria by creating affordable housing scheme with Easy & Flexible payment plans suitable for lower Income Earners & others.

- To reduce unemployment rate & poverty in Nigeria

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to ensure our clients get only well verified Land & Real estate property at best price and to secure genuine property that is free from Government acquisition and Litigation, with a mandate of linking up our prospects to a genuine source of owning Landed properties, with the aim of exceeding the imagination and expectation of our potential client(s) by rendering a quality service(s) to them.

{/* End About Section */} {/* ======= Testimonials Section ======= */}
{/*

Saul Goodman

Ceo & Founder

Proin iaculis purus consequat sem cure digni ssim donec porttitora entum suscipit rhoncus. Accusantium quam, ultricies eget id, aliquam eget nibh et. Maecen aliquam, risus at semper.

*/}
{/* End Testimonials Section */} {/* ======= F.A.Q Section ======= */}


EVEST: HOME OWNERSHIP SCHEME

Evest was established with the core aim of creating a platform where Every Nigerian can have an opportunity to own a home not just a house with a super Convenient payment plan and interest free.

Regardless of the housing deficit challenges with a monthly payment of ₦167,000 for a period of 5 years, you can be a home owner.

This offer also allows you to move into your home before completing the payment with terms and conditions.




F.A.Q

Frequently Asked Questions

  • {" "} Will I get my house once I complete payment?{" "}

    Yes

  • {" "} What are the requirements to purchase a land?{" "}

    Check



Download The App On Google Play Store or The Apple Store








Download Brochure
{/* End F.A.Q Section */}
{/* End #main */} {/* ======= Footer ======= */}
© Copyright{" "} SS Afri Homes & Property Ltd. {" "} All Rights Reserved

Codes by Hipheckts' Inc.
